title: Vlipsy 🔊
description: Vlipsy is the fastest, easiest way to search and share iconic quotes from your favorite, movies, shows, and videos on Slack. React with vlips (video clips) in your daily conversation to add more flavor to your standard Slack messages. /vlip [search term] to send a random vlip reaction /vlips [search phrase] to select a vlip from a list of results
